node.statement: FINITE FREE EPI STATEMENT: For p, q in P_n, define the entropy S(p) = sum_{i<j} log|lambda_i - lambda_j| and the entropy power N(p) = exp(2S(p)/m) where m = n(n-1)/2. Prove N(p boxplus q) >= N(p) + N(q). This is the finite analog of the Shannon EPI. Numerically validated: 0 violations in 13,770 trials (ex7). Equality holds for n=2 (proved analytically in ex7).
